tool_description: An API showcasing all the Climate and Environment related news around the top world newspaper.
name: Climate and Environment
title: Climate and Environment

api_list.name: Get All News Specific to a Newspaper
api_list.description: This Endpoint will provide all the news specific to a newspaper like thetimes, guardian, NYT, telegraph, and much more.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://climate-and-environment.p.rapidapi.com/news/guardian"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-and-environment.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://climate-and-environment.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-and-environment.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Climate Change News
api_list.description: This Endpoint will return all news about the climate and environmental changes from all over the world.
api_list.code:
